definition.name: NXnote
definition.doc:
Any additional freeform information not covered by the other base classes.
This class can be used to store additional information in a NeXus file e.g. pictures, movies, audio, additional text logs

field.name: type
field.doc: Mime content type of note data field e.g. image/jpeg, text/plain, text/html

field.name: file_name
field.doc: Name of original file name if note was read from an external source

field.name: description
field.doc: Title of an image or other details of the note

field.name: sequence_index
field.doc: Sequence index of note, for placing a sequence of multiple **NXnote** groups in an order. Starts with 1.

field.name: data
field.doc: Binary note data - if text, line terminator is [CR][LF].

attribute.name: default
attribute.doc:
.. index:: plotting
Declares which child group contains a path leading to a :ref:`NXdata` group.
It is recommended (as of NIAC2014) to use this attribute to help define the path to the default dataset to be plotted. See https://www.nexusformat.org/2014_How_to_find_default_data.html for a summary of the discussion.
